column5: ok maybe we're not going to burds lol, next option could be barrie docks for perch, or how is scugog river right now? what can ya catch now? is it worth going up there? any other suggestions on places to go within hour or 2 hours from tdot? thnx

hey bud drive to trenton and fish off the rivermouth along the breakwall,guys have been catching fish there for about 1 week steady now the fish are at the mouth of the trent river ,its only  1 1/2 hours from,toronto go get em....cheers,oh ya fish at dusk and stay there until about 1-2 am....good luck p.s. oh ya bring minnows&use slip floats and bounce jigs with dew worms and berkley power grubs across the river bottom...you can PM me
hmm that sounds good, may give it a try, thnx!
